content: use needle size us #1 for s/m or us #2 for m/l this glove pattern was written by natasha sills inspired by kristi geraci s froot loop socks 1 featured in knitty spring 08 **a note about sizing ** the gauge listed in the pattern is for the s/m size on us#1 needles the palm circumference is approximately 6 25 unstretched and stretches to snugly fit my 7 75 bare palm i m sorry i don t have the exact gauge/circumference for the larger size but i will update this page when i get done knitting them 1 http //www knitty com/issuespring08/pattfrootloop html
